talk_text: Prince Laharl...

Make no mistake!
I am not in any way sad he is dead!

Hehehe!
How I love money!

With this big pile of gold to fund my military campaign, I shall surely succeed in becoming the next 
Overlord! $ *Snort*

Long time, no see, Hoggmeiser. 
Now that my old man's dead, I'm the Netherworld's 
next Overlord!
Just because you're the last Overlord's son, doesn't mean you automatically get to be next. $

It's strength that counts in the Netherworld. $
If you want what is now mine, you'll have to take it by force. $

That's exactly what I had in mind! 
Come on!
Fighting over money and power....

Were the angels right 
about demons? If they really are evil, then that means...

Hahahaha....
You lose, Hoggmeiser!
I'm taking everything, as promised.

Y-You can't!
I can't live 
without my money! $

I see.
Well in that case, I'd better just finish you off now.
*Squeal*

This is too much...
Not only is he taking his money, but his life too....
Wait, you bully!!

Who are you?
Hoggmeiser's son?

I am Porkmeister!
And it's my time to shine! $

You might as well just give up now!
I won't go easy on you just because you're a kid.

....Hey kid.
Why are you risking your life for this greedy pig?
Don't you understand, Prince Laharl?
This is love!
Here we go again...

Love, love, love. Is that all you've got in your puny little head!?
You damn Love Freak!

You can call me whatever you want.
But, why is it you refuse to believe in love?

You reject it because you're afraid of it!
Isn't that right?

D-Don't you ever shut up?!
I will never love anything, ever!
...This looks like something I can use to my advantage! $
Oh! You're still alive? $
Haha! My son!

What?
You're not going to finish him off?

Naaah, I won't bother. 
It wouldn't make me 
any richer.

Alright, Prinnies! 
Grab all the good stuff!!

....But.
But no need to clean them out entirely. 
Make sure they've got something left to live on.
Prince Laharl....
...What?

Master Lamington, all is well.
I have decided to stay in the Netherworld a little while longer.

I met a demon whose name is Laharl. He is 
selfish, self-centered, and stubborn. And those aren't 
his only shortcomings.....

But... I have discovered a 
hint of kindness in his heart.

It may be just a small glimmer right now, but I have great hope that 
this demon will one day learn the meaning of love.

So, Master Lamington...
... I plead for a little more time to stay by Laharl's side.
null_s

Our little Flonne.....
She has managed to avoid being slaughtered by the demons...

....So, Krichevskoy was already 
dead.

What I don't understand is why Flonne 
hasn't returned to Celestia.

Ah!
Is it possible that she's trying to 
form an alliance with the demons to gain control of Celestia!?

That's it! That has to be it!
How could I have let you get away with it for this long?
The Seraph's title belongs to me!
null_s
A pendant?

Yes....
It was gone when I woke up this morning...

The Seraph gave that pendant to me 
before I came to the Netherworld....

An Apprentice Angel like me...
...Can't stay in the Netherworld 
very long without that pendant...

If I don't get it back soon, I
will lose all of my energy, and eventually die....

Hmmmm, is that so? Well, that sucks.
Prince! What are you going to do?

L-Laharl...
If you find my pendant, I will show you something good, by way of thanks...
Something good, you say?

Hmph.
If I wanted it, I'd 
just steal it from you.

If you were to do that, then 
my gift will 
never be yours...
....What's that supposed to mean?

....Are you 
trying to provoke me?

Hmph....Fine.
I've got some time to kill.

Prince Laharl....
Thank you...

Don't ever say "thanks" to me again!
Your words make me disgusted!

Let me make one thing clear. I'm not doing this for your sake!
And when I find that pendant, that "something good" is mine!!
It's so hot here!!

Prince, in this heat, Flonne's gonna shrivel up 
long before 
we find that pendant.

What do you mean? 
I feel fine!

How come? I'm gonna kill you if you say Angels 
don't sweat or 
have to go to the bathroom.

N-No, that's not it.
I just mean, that medicine that a Prinny gave me seems 
to be really helping.

Huh? 
The Prinnies aren't as nice as you think. 
Maybe you've been cursed.

No, it's true!
I feel much better now.
Which one of 'em was it who gave you this medicine?

Ummmmm....
Oh, I remember! It was the pink one...

The pink Prinny?
But Prinnies are blue.
There aren't any pink Prinnies.
*Sniffles* I'm telling the truth....

Hey!
Hey, for future reference, what kind of guy is this Seraph?
Future reference?

Yeah. 
I may end up fighting him one day when I conquer Celestia.

I'm going to all this trouble to look for your pendant. 
The least you could do 
is tell me.

Yes.
I guess that makes sense.
You knucklehead...

Well... 
Master Lamington, the Seraph, is a very kind Angel.
He loves flowers and poems.

Don't bother with all that crap.
Just tell me about his weaknesses....

Hmmmm, so you 
look up to the Seraph?

Yes, of course.
Isn't there someone that you look up to?
Well, of course. I looked up to the late King.

What?
You don't look up to ME!?
Yes...

Hmph!
Why you...! And you call yourself my vassal!?

Enough! 
Let's stop talking about this nonsense! 
We've gotta find that pendant!

*Grunt* Flonne...
That girl is probably breathing her last few breaths right now....

Now my position is secure.
No one can stop me now!
null_s

W-What?
The pendant's shining...........!?

Gaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!!
Hot! Hot! 
Too hottttt!!!!!!

Argh! Enough!
I have no use for this anymore! 
I will throw it away!

...Hey!
Who would leave a beautiful pendant like this just lying around?

How fortunate! 
It must be a gift from the heavens, a reward for my good behavior!

You moron.
What kind of demon gets gifts from the heavens?

Oh, what a lucky day indeed! 
To be able to confront 
my rival once again!

Well, if it isn't Mid-Boss again.
You're still alive? We already beat you once, remember?

How dare you! Don't assume that I can be defeated so easily! 
And besides, I prefer being called 
Dark Adonis...

Ah! My pendant!
Please, Mr. Mid-Boss! May I have my pendant back?
It's very important to me!

I can't do that, even at the request 
of someone so lovely.

Finders keepers, losers weepers! 
Therefore.... It belongs to moi!

No! The pendant 
will punish anyone who has a wicked heart! 
If you don't give it back soon, you'll be punished....!!
null_s
....What? Is it broken?

Hahahahaha!!
How unfortunate - for you!! 
The heavens would never 
punish such a pure heart as mine!

And on top of my pure heart, I have a beautiful name!
Dark Adonis!

Shut up. 
I already told you. 
Your name is "Mid-Boss".

Hahahahaha!!
Don't think for one minute that 
I am but an ordinary mid-boss! That would be a fatal error!!!

Oh.
So you admit that you're a mid-boss!

Shut up!!
I shall crush you so that I never have to hear 
the name Mid-Boss ever again!

My pendant....!
If I can't get it back...

It's here. Hurry up and take it.
It's burning my hand.
O-Okay!

....Hmph. The pendant is must be trying 
to tell me that my heart is wicked.
That's good to know.

So, where is the reward you promised me?
Give me that "something good" you were talking about!
Thank you, Prince Laharl.

S-Stop it already!
I told you never to say thanks ever again!
It's freaking me out!

So, the reward....
I already gave it to you.
What are you talking about!?

Put your hand on your heart.
Can you feel it?
The warmth inside your heart.

You faced great danger 
to find this pendant.

You pretend to be evil, but I know there is kindness 
in your heart.

By going to such trouble to help me, you've discovered the kindness inside your own heart. 
This is my gift to you!

......!!
A-A-Are you insane!?
How can you say something so offensive! I am the great Laharl!

Unbelievable!
I've been tricked 
by an angel!

Unbelievable!
I will remember this!
After ranting and raving for a few more minutes, Laharl storms off...

There is kindness inside the hearts of demons too. They can also love!
One day, angels and demons 
will become friends!

Boy, that theory is a bit out there... 
You really are a Love Freak.

I'm warning you. If you keep 
expecting things to always turn out so great, you're bound to be disappointed.

Most demons would sneak up and strangle you
without a second thought.

Hmmmm. 
And are you like that, Miss Etna?

Maybe. Why are you asking?
That's for me to know and you to find out.
Hahaha!
null_s
Hahahahaha!!
Heavens! Is this Prince Laharl's...?

Stop making such a terrible racket, you two.
What are you two laughing about, anyway?

P-P-P-Prince.... 
Look at this....Ahahaha, oh my god! *giggles*
W-W-W-W-W-What is this!?
It's a humiliating photo of you.

I can see that!!
Who the hell 
took it!

How should I know? 
Oh, by the way, something is written on the back.
null_s

No!! If this picture 
gets published in the Netherworld press, I'll be ruined!

Whoever took this, just wait!
I'll hunt them down, and make them burn forever in the eternal flames of hell! And I'll use their stupid paparazzi shots as kindling!
null_s

An ambush?
How clever.
Brotherly love.
null_s
What!!?
null_s
Love conquers all.
null_s
Stop! Stop it!
null_s
There is nothing greater in life than true friendship.
null_s
Gwaaaahhhh!!

Prince Laharl? 
What's wrong?

Oh, him?
He just hates hearing 
optimistic platitudes.

Hmm, is that so?
Let me try...
Eternal love ♥
null_s

Gyaaaaaaaaaaaah!!
That is the worst phrase of all!!
D-Do you want to kill me!?

Huh?
But, that's my favorite thing to say.

What the hell.... 
How could these Imps possibly know 
that this is my greatest weakness...?
Prince, a new enemy is coming this way.

Gaaaaaaahhh! I don't know why... 
but
I just can't stand curvaceous women!!

Prince Laharl.
Have you ever heard about the birds and the bees?
Hahahaha....
null_s

It has been a while, Prince.
Do you still remember me?
...How could I remember an insignificant nobody like you?

Stop talking so tough, Prince.
I know all of 
your weaknesses.
Isn't that right, Etna?

Hahahahahah!
Yes, Etna is my loyal dog!
Miss Etna, why....?

He's got the goods on me...
This kind of thing is standard practice here in the Netherworld.

Now, dear Prince...
This place shall become your grave.

Etna.
You've served your purpose.

But, we had a deal....!
What about my memories!?

What use are memories to you 
when you are moments from death?
Hahahaha....

Hehehehe.....
You don't know when to give up, do you, Prince?
But, your luck ends here!!
Do a good deed every day! ♥
Ah!
Be loyal until the end! ♥
No!!

Can you withstand an attack that targets both of your vulnerabilities at once?
No! It is impossible!
Alright! It's time for my final attack!!
Woah! Hold it right there!

Whenever a lovely flower sheds a tear, I loving smile is all you need to turn that frown upside down! 
My flower of love is about to bloom!
...Did someone call for Dark Adonis?
Why are you here!?

To say "hello", of course.
You're too weak. I just couldn't stand on the sidelines any longer.
Let me give you some advice.
...What!?

Laharl!!
Close your eyes and plug your ears!!
T-Thanks!!
What excellent advice!!

Hehehehe.....
The tides have turned, Maderas!

What?! No!!
E-Etna! What are you waiting for!
Kill Laharl!!
If you refuse, I'll erase your memory for good!
Go ahead, why don't ya?
What did you just say to me!!?

2 years ago... 
when the King died, I followed your orders
and poisoned the Prince so that you'd give me back my memories.

But, I hated myself for it and I decided I didn't want to go on living like that.
So I stopped.

I've been waiting for 
this moment for a long time.

Then, why have you been following 
my orders until now...?

Heeheehee.
You mean it's not clear to you?
Let me explain it to you then...

I have been waiting for just the right moment 
to get my revenge on the bastard 
who ruined my life!

From now on, I'm going to live my life any way I choose. 
And no one's gonna stop me!!

How dare you turn against me!
You double-crossing-back-stabber!!!! You were always a liar! I can't believe your pants aren't on fire!

Ahh... The whining of a sore loser. 
It's music to my ears....

It's over.
From now on, whenever you hear my name, you're going to pee in your pants!

Eeeep!! F-Forgive me!!!
Please, spare my life!!
Why should I?

Forgive me, o Lady Etna!
Your strength, beauty, and intelligence are unsurpassed in all the Netherworld!
Please don't hurt me!

That's more like it! Besides, killing a sore loser like you would mean getting my hands dirty. 
So, this time, I'll forgive you.
...You know what I want, right?

O-Okay! I will return the candid photos of Master Laharl immediately, as well as your memory! 
I'll return everything!
Great! It looks like everything's all settled, doesn't it, Prince?
No, it doesn't!!

You tried to poison me in my sleep. 
You used me as bait for your revenge. 
What kind of vassal are you!?
B-But Prince Laharl....!
However!

...However, I don't mind if that's
how you want to be.

A true demon 
is always full of ambition 
and aims for the very top.

When I become Overlord, I'll need a right-hand demon 
like you under my command.
Prince...

But remember!
I'm going to work you into the ground!
You better be prepared for some hard graft!
Uh-uh! YOU better be prepared!

I'll be watching your every move. 
If you don't prove yourself worthy of the throne....
An accident might just befall you. ♥

Hmph....
You can take my place if that happens.

*Giggle*
Don't worry, I will.

...I'll never understand these two.
After all that, Prince Laharl and Etna reconciled.

I guess demons 
just have their own way of expressing love.

*Giggle*
It's a weird feeling.

I never experienced 
anything like this 
in Celestia...

Hey, wait! Everyone!
Are you not forgetting someone?
null_s

Hahahahahah!
I win! I am the Overlord!

How could I ever live 
with you on the throne?

Etna!
You're still alive!!

The Prince sure is a pain in the ass.
Could anything be worse than 
losing to a twerp like him?

You are deluded if you think you can inherit the throne! 
you're about 100 lightyears too early!

Etna!
What are you talking about?
Shut up! Get away from me!
Everything begins to flash as a loud noise blares.
Waaaahh!!!!

Now everything belongs to me!
I will be the protagonist from now on!!
null_s

Prince Laharl.
Isn't it the Month of the Adder? 
And isn't today Curseday...? So doesn't that mean...

That's right.
I've ordered the Prinnies to spread copies 
of this letter I've written all over the Netherworld.

Ummmm, Prince?
Are you making an open challenge to the entire Netherworld?

Are you an idiot?
Don't you get it?
There's no such thing as a formal claim for the position of Overlord.
Huh?

It's a trap.
Look at how many people are claiming the throne. 
I'm trying to bring them all together in the same place.
Oh, I see.

And when I've defeated them all, no one will question 
that I am the one true Overlord!
Hahahahahahah!!!!
null_s
Hey, dood!

Hmm?
Prinnies?

We thought we might 
try and defeat you 
and become the Overlord, dood.

What!?
You're not allowed to pull off a coup d'etat 
without me!
I'm the one who's supposed to kill the Prince!!

Miss Etna.
It might not be such a good idea 
to announce that in front of the person in question.

A head-on attack 
would be suicide, we know that dood!

Huh?
So you plan to decide this battle some other way?

That's right, dood!
Alright, let's just play rock-paper-scissors to decide the winner, dood!

Ah...ok.
You mean a blow to the head with a rock, paper slaps back and forth, and then a poke in the eye with scissors, right?

N-N-No, dood! 
We mean the children's game, dood!

Hahahahahah!
I am the Overlord of an alternate Netherworld!
I tried taking over this world before, but Krichevskoy got in the way!

You are just one of the Overlords 
that I will crush on my way to 
becoming the "Supreme Overlord"!

Puny boy!
Die!! What you see before you represents 
only a fraction of my power!

Yes.
Well, it's really hard to tell considering I can only see a part of you.

Yes.
You're just too big.

Urgh. Fine!
If it's size you're concerned about, I can make adjustments!!
The enemy changes into 5 doppelgangers.

You see this? This is my famous Doppelganger spell!
There are 5 of me now!
You're speechless now, aren't you!?
Ok. Now this just became a problem.

Don't worry!
Splitting into 5 means 
that his love has been divided 5 ways!

We won't lose 
to someone like that!

Oh! Flonne's burning with determination!
You're enjoying yourself, aren't you?

Yes! I love this stuff!
Let's go guys!
We've been waiting for you, demons!
null_s
When the darkness of evil is on the rise,
null_s
We crash the villainous party!
null_s
The 7 lights of justice save the world with courage and hope!!
null_s
To save the world with courage and hope!
null_s
With our powers combined we are--
null_s
The Prism...!!
null_s
Rangers!!!!
Cool!

Miss Etna!
Quick, let's strike our coolest poses!
*Sigh*......You serious?
You better believe it!
...Wait a second, are you guys wanting to become Overlords?
Why, of course! If we win, we'll be able to produce our brand new series, "The Demon Hunters".

Is this the Heart of Evil?
No one's here.

Which means... 
The Prince is now the Overlord..?
No, hold it right there!!
Ah. It's Mid-Boss....Again..

You can't have forgotten me, I'm your eternal rival!
You weren't thinking of declaring yourself Overlord 
without battling moi first, were you?

I've already settled 
things with you!

Fool!
Did you think that 
I was serious?

That was merely a smokescreen.
I was merely feigning weakness so that you would let your guard down!!

Now, you shall 
witness my true power!!

Check out these cat-like reflexes!!
And these rock-hard pecks! I wore 100-ton boxers every day 
during training to get these muscles!!

Here I come!
The throne will be 
mine!!!!!!!!!!!!

Ugh....!
M-My stomach hurts....!!

Just when I was getting started... 
I-I beg your pardon, but I need to use the restroom
...You'll see me again, soon!
He ran away.....

His excuses are getting 
more and more pathetic.

Hmm?
So is that it?

That means... 
I'm the Overlord!!

Overlord! Overlord! Overlord!!!
Hahahahahaha!

Ah.....
The Prince is now the Overlord...
Somehow, I just can't quite believe it.

*Giggle*
Now, now. It's a good thing, isn't it?

Look at him. 
He is so happy...
He pretends to be evil, but he can be cute sometimes.

You think? Well, he's just a kid, after all.
Anyway, shouldn't you be worried?

Huh?
What do you mean?

You helped the Prince 
become the Overlord.

Master Lamington, are you here!?
Laharl, the son of King Krichevskoy, has been crowned the new Overlord!!
Hmm...

That's not all!
That trainee Flonne 
helped him win the throne!

This is no longer a case of disobeying orders. 
This is treason!

So!!?
So!!?
What are you going to do about this!?

Hmm...
Let me think about it.

Think about it!?
Think about it, you say!?
This is a grave matter!
We can't just ignore it! If you have no objections, I will handle this myself!!
null_s

Oh, Prince...
I got a job for ya.

Call me "Your Majesty".
I'm the Overlord now!

Aww, come on... 
That's a minor detail.

We talked about this yesterday. Did you forget?
Come in, Aramis.
null_s

The job is this: 
This kid says he is missing some pets.
null_s

??? 
...... So, what do you want me to do...?
Your job is to go look for them!
null_s

What!!?
Why would I, the great and mighty Overlord Laharl, waste time looking for some stupid little brat's pets!?

Ridiculous! Absolutely ridiculous!
Bring me something more fitting 
for my first task as Overlord!

I refuse!!
This may seem trivial to you, but it's very important to him!

This is a perfect way to begin your rule as Overlord!
And if you don't do it, I'm never going to accept you as Overlord!

Miss Etna is dead serious. That's not like her.
Prince Laharl, you'd better listen to her this time...

Yes, I think so too!
If I act rashly and make her angry, things may get out of hand.
Ok...
null_s
OoooOoooooOOoOOhh....
A zombie.
It is indeed a zombie.

Hey, brat.
Don't tell me this is one of your pets.

That's right.
You got a problem with that?

Not at all.
You got good taste, kid.
So...how do we catch it?
Why don't we do the same thing we always do?

*Sigh*....Boring...
Finding these pets is so boring.

Stop complaining.
Don't you want to become a respected Overlord?

Miss Etna.
She sure is serious today.

Prince, if you really want to become a good Overlord
you need to start 
acting more like your father.
You mean, King Krichevskoy?

That's right.
Back when I started working 
in the castle.

I was teased and picked on every day 
for being a commoner.

You were?
That's hard to believe.

At that time, I was very naive.
I was a scared little girl.

The only thing that helped me get through those days 
was my faithful pet.

You raised a pet?
And then what?

Well, one day 
it was killed...  
The people who bullied me... 
They killed him.
T-That's awful...

That was when the King saw me crying... 
and he reached out his hand to me...
When I told him what happened, he helped me bury my pet.
He must have been a kind man.

I’m not sure I know what you mean by "kindness".
But the King sure was a great man, and one that I respected.

That's why I pledged
my deepest loyalty to him.

But, the Prince... 
He's still not truly fit to succeed King Krichevskoy 
as the Overlord.

So, that's why you want Prince Laharl 
to become just like his father?

Heehee. I see. 
You worry a lot about Prince Laharl after all.
That's love!

Really?
Oh yeah, and if he fails, I'll just kill him.
Wh-!?

Ahaha...
Just kidding.

I don't know about that. 
It doesn't seem like you're joking...
OoooOoooooOOoOOhh....

Kill one and another appears in its place... 
Zombies, zombies, zombies...

I'm getting sick 
and tired of this!

This is why I hate normies.
Check out that zombie.
THAT is my masterpiece.

The fists of a Dark Karate Master... 
The legs of the fastest demon in the Netherworld....

The brain of Mahogany, a famous sorcerer... 
The iron body of Hercules...

And a horse wiener, all combined into one: 
The Netherworld's ultimate zombie!
A horse wiener!? Now THAT'S dangerous! Don't let your guard down!!

See?
I caught 'em all.
So quit your complaining.
T-Thanks, Overlord Laharl.

H-Hmph...!
Well, it IS part of my job.

And what are you doing saying "thanks"? You're a demon!
If you want to thank me, you should lay down your life for me!

Hmmm.
Prince, don't you think demanding a human sacrifice is a little harsh?

F-Fool!
... I meant he should become my vassal 
and serve me when you're old enough!
....Yes, Your Highness.
And speak to me with respect from now on, got it?
Yes, Your Majesty!!

Hehehehe.....
Hahahahahahah!!!!

Did you hear that, Etna?
That kid called me 
"Your Majesty"!

What do you think about that?!
Don't you think you should show me 
some more respect as well?

Well, I guess you did a good job this time.
But, I'm still watching you 
to see if you mess up!

Hmm....
Why you...!

Wow.
Etna sure has high standards.

Still, Laharl has changed quite a bit recently. 
He is maturing little by little as he meets new people.

And it feels like I have changed, too.... 
since meeting him and his companions.

If you open your heart, you will surely grow and learn many new things....
...It doesn't matter if you're a human, an angel or a demon.

Maybe if I explain this to Master Lamington, he'll see that 
demons aren't so bad...
And, maybe one day...
null_s
null_s

Hmmm...Hmmm...
... Singing?
Who would be singing at this hour...?

Prinnies....?
Um, where are you going....?

Don't try 
to stop them.
They have finally been able to atone for their sins.

The only thing we can do now 
is pray for their happiness 
in their next lives....

I see.
Is this what people mean when they say "fly-by-night"?

Hmmm.
You certainly are an interesting person, Flonne.
Since you came, the Prince has changed.

You really think so?
They say that people tend to see things the way they want them to be, so I wasn't sure if Laharl has really changed or not.

But, if it isn't just my imagination, that means Laharl is definitely 
awakening to the idea of love!

Hmmm.
Love is magnificent!
Heh... It surely is...
null_s
What!?
Like I said, several Prinnies are missing!
Why!?

How should I know?
Maybe they ran away because you treated 
them badly!

Hmm....
C-Come to think of it, 22-hour workdays 
with no days off WAS a bit harsh...

...That's the 
harshest working environment I've ever heard of.

Prince of the Netherworld.
Don't worry. 
They'll be alright....dood.

I'm not worried about THEM!
If people hear that I let my vassals escape, they'll lose all respect for me!

That's why we're 
gonna find them!
Even if it is a big waste of time!

Laharl, you shouldn't speak like that!
It's because you're like this 
that the Prinnies fly-by-night!
What does that even mean!? Fly-by-night!?

N-Nothing...
I think you heard wrong...
Zip...♪

....Flonne...
